mapper.sql: attendanceschemeid, type, name, amount, timeconfig, enableflag, createtime, orgid, createstaffid
mapper.select:
select
from attendancescheme where orgid=#{orgid}
and ( name like '%${search}%')
order by createtime desc
mapper.delete: delete from attendancescheme where attendanceschemeid = #{attendanceschemeid} and orgid=#{orgid}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into attendancescheme (type, name, amount, timeconfig, enableflag, createtime, orgid, createstaffid) values (#{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update attendancescheme
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
timeconfig = #{timeconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enableflag = #{enableflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where attendanceschemeid = #{attendanceschemeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and orgid=#{orgid}

update attendancescheme set type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, timeconfig = #{timeconfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enableflag = #{enableflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where attendanceschemeid = #{attendanceschemeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
